GSP33gaukarsu:33: aje sāmye tu ye kecid GK_4.95a
GSP33gaukarsu:124: ādāv ante ca yan nāsti GK_2.6a
GSP33gaukarsu:125: ādāv ante ca yan nāsti GK_4.31a
GSP33gaukarsu:225: ko nv enaṃ janayed iti GK_3.25c
GSP33gaukarsu:234: khe vai paśyanti te padam GK_4.28d
GSP33gaukarsu:314: tac ca loko na gāhate GK_4.95d
GSP33gaukarsu:362: tasya hy ādir na vidyate GK_4.23d
GSP33gaukarsu:364: taṃ bhāvaṃ sa tu paśyati GK_2.29b
GSP33gaukarsu:417: dvau tau turye na sidhyataḥ GK_1.11d
GSP33gaukarsu:440: na nidrāṃ naiva ca svapnaṃ GK_1.14c
GSP33gaukarsu:446: na baddho na ca sādhakaḥ GK_2.32b
GSP33gaukarsu:453: na mumukṣur na vai mukta GK_2.32c
GSP33gaukarsu:586: bhinnaṃ nityaṃ kathaṃ ca tat GK_4.11d
GSP33gaukarsu:808: sā ca turye na vidyate GK_1.13d
GSP33gaukarsu:809: sā ca māyā na vidyate GK_4.58d
GSP33gaukarsu:830: sphuṭā eva ca ye bahiḥ GK_2.15b
